arts.ttl: Atalanta Midfielder Rues Missed Chances After Frustrating Celtic Draw
arts.sum: Numerous wasted goalscoring opportunities saw Atalanta rue missed chances in a gut-wrenching 0-0 draw against Celtic. Despite launching 22 shots, including six on target, La Dea slipped to their second goalless draw in three UEFA Champions League outings this season. The post Atalanta Midfielder Rues Missed Chances After Frustrating Celtic Draw appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: How Rodgers earned 'one of his best results' in Atalanta draw
arts.sum: Former Celtic manager Neil Lennon says the team's gutsy goalless Champions League draw at Atalanta delivered "one of the best results of Brendan Rodgers' career".

arts.ttl: Watch all of Schmeichel's saves as Celtic frustrate Atalanta
arts.sum: Watch all of Celtic goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel's saves in the 0-0 Champions League draw with Atalanta in Bergamo.

arts.ttl: Auston Trusty turns Champions League dream into reality as Celtic defender dives in for 'sink or swim' moments
arts.sum: The American defender put in a dominant display at the heart of the Hoops backline to claim a huge result in Bergamo

arts.ttl: Celtic land shot to kill off 'desperate' Champions League heavyweights and move ONE WIN from playoff millions
arts.sum: Luckless Leipzig – flying high in the Bundesliga – know defeat in Glasgow now will likely prove fatal

arts.ttl: Celtic withstand Atalanta pressure to secure draw
arts.sum: Watch highlights as Celtic earn an important Champions League point by holding last season's Europa League winners Atalanta to a goalless draw in Bergamo.

arts.ttl: Watch Celtic hold firm for draw with Atalanta
arts.sum: Watch highlights as Celtic earn an important Champions League point by holding last season's Europa League winners Atalanta to a goalless draw in Bergamo.

arts.ttl: What Chris Sutton said about Auston Trusty vs Atalanta has Celtic fans all saying the same thing
arts.sum: Celtic’s draw against Atalanta in the Champions League will breathe new life into the fans who were probably fearing the worst in Bergamo tonight. A £6m signing from Sheffield United, Trusty has been thrust into the Celtic team due to Cameron Carter-Vickers’ injury status and after tonight, it seems that the American is being viewed in a new light by the Hoops support.

arts.ttl: Proud Rodgers 'never doubted' his Celtic players
arts.sum: Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers says his team showed "great courage" in Bergamo as they rebounded from the 7-1 Champions League defeat by Borussia Dortmund to hold Atalanta to a goalless draw.

arts.ttl: James McFadden says Celtic have just answered their Champions League critics, hails two 'outstanding' heroes
arts.sum: Celtic put in a Herculean effort against Atalanta to earn their first-ever Champions League point on Italian soil and McFadden pinpointed Liam Scales and Auston Trusty for their outstanding performance in Bergamo. And James McFadden believes Rodgers, and Celtic, have just answered their critics with a ‘fantastic’ Champions League result in Bergamo tonight.
